nodes.name: Process One Image at a Time

sections.content: Open with a visually striking background of the city at night, featuring iconic landmarks like skyscrapers and neon lights. Introduce the main character in a futuristic office setting.
sections.visual_prompt: The scene opens with a panoramic view of a busy city at night. The camera pans down to show a modern office building with sleek glass facades and bright, colorful advertisements.

sections.content: Cut to the main character walking into a meeting room, where they present their latest design project.
sections.visual_prompt: The camera follows the main character as they enter a large, futuristic conference room. The room is filled with high-tech equipment and large screens displaying various digital designs.

sections.content: In the meeting room, show reactions from other team members who appreciate the creativity and originality of the design.
sections.visual_prompt: Inside the conference room, the main character presents their design. The other team members lean in, looking impressed and discussing the project enthusiastically.

sections.content: Cut to a montage of the main character working on different projects throughout the day, showcasing their versatility and passion for design.
sections.visual_prompt: A series of quick shots show the main character working in various settingsâ€”on a rooftop, in an underground lab, and at a bustling event. Each scene highlights their creativity and dedication.

sections.content: End with the main character receiving recognition for their work at an awards ceremony, surrounded by fellow designers and industry leaders.
sections.visual_prompt: The scene concludes with the main character being recognized at a prestigious design award ceremony. The room is filled with other successful designers, and they all applaud as the main character receives their trophy.

main.node: Process One Image at a Time
